<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Leshy Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=1040) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 54 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, but haven’t rolled yet.

</column>

---

You notice spirits that inhabit objects, learning which bring good fortune and which are unlucky. You focus on the power of a lucky object, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw against the triggering effect.

<title level="2">Leshy Superstition leads to...</title>
[Lucky Keepsake](/Feats.aspx?ID=1048)
name: Leshy Superstition
